body.name: U.S. Traveler Boren Polycarbonate Hardside Rugged Travel Suitcase Luggage with 8 Spinner Wheels, Aluminum Handle, Pink, Carry-on 22-Inch, USB Port
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Hardshell exterior is designed to be waterproof for all your rainy travels. Hardshell construction is designed to absorb impact.
Retractable handle system allows you to maneuver your bag with ease. Top and side grab handles are designed to make lifting easy and convenient.
360-degree spinner wheels allow smooth and effortless mobility. Recessed handle and wheels to maximize the carrying capacity while meeting FFA size requirements.
Built-in USB port on the 21” carry-on with an interior power bank compartment provide quick connection to your portable electronic device for a quick charge. Power bank is not included.
22” Spinner’s Exterior and Interior Dimensions: 21. 5”H x 14. 25”W x 9. 5”D (6. 48 lbs. ) and 19”H x 13. 75”W x 9”D
body.description: Hardshell exterior is designed to be waterproof for all your rainy travels. Hardshell construction is designed to absorb impact. Retractable handle system allows you to maneuver your bag with ease. 360-degree spinner wheels allow smooth and effortless mobility. Top and side grab handles are designed to make lifting easy and convenient. Recessed handle and wheels to maximize the carrying capacity while meeting FFA size requirements. Imprinted fully-lined interior with zippered center divider. Tie down straps help secure your belongings. Clam shell opening provides easy organization. Built-in USB port on the 21” carry-on with an interior power bank compartment provide quick connection to your portable electronic device for a quick charge. Power bank is not included. 22" Spinner Exterior Dimensions: 21. 5”H x 14. 25”W x 9. 5”D (6. 48 lbs. ) 22" Spinner Interior Dimensions: 19”H x 13. 75”W x 9”D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The suitcase was a little larger than expected, but super light weight and very durable. Has survived multiple travels and has been sat on just to zip it close. There is a small rip along the liner on the inside which was a little disappointing. Overall a good investment though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First impression is that it is a tad flimsy, but still holding up well with no damage after one air trip and two road trips.May buy another one of these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars SPLITS OPEN ALL THE TIME!!!
reviews.reviewText: I got this because my normal suitcase, that has lasted me for years, had an issue with the handle not retracting easily (the mechanism inside the slide was broken), and I didn't want to have to screw around with it at the airport. I didn't feel like paying 500$ for a new one (mistake #1), so based on the high review score, I went with this one because it was one of the only ones that would be delivered in time for a trip I was making.The luggage is your average super basic design, very little padding on the inside, standard zipper, handles, and wheels. To it's credit, the wheels feel smooth when rolling and the handle retracts/extends easily. That's why it got 1 star (also because you can't leave zero stars)Now for the bad. I've had this for less than a year, and on 5 separate occasions, it has split open. three of the times it has split when coming off the luggage conveyor at my destination, forcing me to have to repack it on the spot. Once it split while Just rolling it (literally just dumped everything on on the ground) and Once it split somewhere between the airplane and the cart, forcing Southwest's baggage handlers to deliver it to the oversize cargo area. The zipper on this suitcase is an absolute POS (piece of...), and for that reason, I CANNOT recommend this to anyone.Yes, I don't overpack it (the weight when scanned at the airport is 40-45lbs always), yes, I ensure BOTH zippers are fully closed, etc. It's just crap zipper system. The only way you can guarantee this thing does not split is to either wrap it in plastic wrap, or get a belt or something that goes around it to keep it sealed (or maybe duct tape it shut). That's the only way I can see you guaranteeing this thing doesn't split open somewhere between when you give it to the Agents , the Plane and then back to you at the destination. DO NOT BUY.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: so full disclosure, i bought this when it was on sale. definitely worth the price i paid for it. the material feels just a tad bit flimsier than i expected, but its held up decently enough for me. wheels work great, lots of storage. only gave it 4 out of 5 stars because i did have a little bit of zipper issues for a while around the corners, but it was nothing a careful tug or two couldnt fix. plus, i probably did pack just a tad bit too much in it. just make sure you can close it properly and that shouldnt be an issue. overall, its lightweight, easily maneuverable, and withstood the abuse i put it through at the airport haha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality. Good value
reviews.reviewText: Suitcases are very expensive and some don’t last long after the beatings they take.I’ve used this several times including a couple of trips internationally and it really holds up. Tons of space inside including some hidden areas as well. Wheels work good and it’s easy to move. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved the color and size
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my daughter who attends school out of state. Excellent size, beautiful color and very durable. Great value for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for one time use
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 2 of these for an international flight to visit family in a remote area. I have to bring gifts and things to sustain my own living (bedding, chairs, food for 3-5 days travel incase I was stuck somewhere that didn’t have food). Bags were packed at under 50lbs for US regulations.Loved how lightweight the suitcases were!ConsHard shell isn’t hard. Very lightweight and flimsy. One suitcase after 1st US flight had a corner caved in severely. Total of 7 different airplanes before destination. I am 4 flights in and the handle appears it might break but they are still rolling on and zipper is holding up. The other suitcase has already torn on the inside where you can zip the flap to hold your clothes in one side. Not sure which flight that happened on because I am living out of a book-bag. I only opened to check contents security. I imagine before I reach my final destination it will be ripped so much it’s only one big compartment, which will make difficult to shut. I do not need to bring the suitcases back with me so what is happening is fine but if you are thinking you are going to have a lifetime suitcase for $89 think again. They were perfect for my one time use but nothing else.

reviews.reviewerName: Great luggage actually beautiful, just not large as my current luggage I’m getting rid of Great luggage actually beautiful, just not large as my current luggage I’m getting rid of
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The luggage lives up to its name
reviews.reviewText: I love the color and design, just not as large as I would like , I’m a tall man. The average person would enjoy. I need a lot of space lol. Also the set was for me and my family.the second pic is my wife’s current luggage. She needs the large bag and my current bag is bigger than that
I like the color. It nice inside

I do not recommend purchasing this bag. Travel once with the bag and it Crack and the wheel came off. I originally brought the 3 piece set and the larger bag was completely destroyed after one use, so I recently purchased it again and the same thing happen. The quality of this bag is horrible not worth the money
I Travelled with this suitcase 4 times already and it held up.. so I would say just buy it… I like it
